dt: {bc}the part of a public building where an {a_link|audience} sits
{bc}a room, hall, or building used for public gatherings

et: borrowed from Latin {it}audītōrium{/it} "lecture room, hall, body of listeners," from {it}audīre{/it} "to hear" + {it}-tōrium,{/it} suffix of places, from neuter of {it}-tōrius,{/it} deverbal adjective suffix {ma}{mat|audible:1|}, {mat|auditory:2|}{/ma}
shortdef: the part of a public building where an audience sits
a room, hall, or building used for public gatherings
